title: The Game of Desire - Featuring Shan Boody
itunes:author: Loud Speakers Network
itunes:summary:
On this week’s episode of #TheFriendZone, we’re joined by Sexologist & Intimacy Expert, Shannon Boodram, to discuss the current “Dating Apocalypse”, emotional intelligence in this day and age, dating apps, monogamy, non-monogamy, polyamory and everything in between.

Find Shannon online: https://www.shanboodram.com
Pre-order her latest book now: https://www.thegameofdesire.com

Black Business of the Week: Bundles Luxury Hair Company
https://instagram.com/bundlesluxuryhairco?igshid=gr5lhbrap5fw

Thank you to our Sponsors:

MAC - MAC Powder Kiss Lipstick is matte reinvented. Head to your nearest MAC location to meet your matte today or go to https://www.maccosmetics.com

Door Dash - Long day at work? Tough day at school? Still suck at the office? Treat yourself to the meal you deserve, on-demand, from your favorite restaurant. Right now, our listeners can get $5 off their first order of $15 or more when you download the DoorDash app and enter promo code THEFRIENDZONE.

Casper Mattress - Casper is a sleep brand that makes expertly designed products to help you get your best rest, one night at a time. Get $50 toward select mattresses by visiting https://casper.com/ZONE and using ZONE at checkout. 

Credit Repair - If you have bad credit, Credit Repair can help you work to fix it. Go to https://www.creditrepair.com/PODCAST for your FREE credit diagnosis. An advocate will pinpoint what’s hurting your score and ways to improve it. And, if you’d like expert help, we got you a fifty-dollar credit off your first fee. Go to https://www.creditrepair.com/PODCAST

Follow #TheFriendZone online:

Twitter - https://twitter.com/friendzonepod
Facebook - https://www.facebook.com/TheFriendZonePodcast

Have a dope day!
